title: 100 Cities Project: Fighting Loneliness | Dinner with Strangers (68)
summary: City life can be lonely, especially when you’re surrounded by so many people. Take the opportunity to meet others hoping for new connections
venue: Arbor, H Queen's #25/F, Hong Kong, HKI, Hong Kong, Hong Kong, HKI
description: Hey, Hong Kong! When was the last time you did something completely spontaneous? Our series groups together complete strangers for a fun day out. That's right, you sign up, and we book the restaurant. We know life can get busy. Don't forget to spend time making new friends! Don't do city life alone and build your community with us. This project is to host dinners in 100 major cities to combat loneliness while supporting locally owned businesses. We are dedicating 25% of sales towards charity or GoFundMe pages at the end of each month. How does it work? -After you register, you'll be emailed an introduction message including a quick questionnaire regarding age, dietary restrictions, hobbies, and interests that we use to select restaurants for the night's group. -At the end of the month, we'll share sales reports with attendees and detail how we are utilizing 25% of sales towards social good. *Your registration does not include your individual food and drink purchases. *These outings are intended to help people make friends. These are not singles gatherings. Our vision is simple: we take the no gimmicks approach to networking. No need for yet another app to take up space on your phone - just four walls and a roof and good food for people to connect :) We coordinate with you directly, human-to-human. If you have any more questions, please contact ermantourageimpact@gmail.com! Brought to you by event series Ermantourage. You can also take a look at our main event calendar via Posh for coffee meets, evening hangouts, and more!

title: 100-Point Champagne Dinner
summary: Join us for an unforgettable evening dedicated to the pinnacle of Champagne, hosted by JamesSuckling.com Critic, Claire Nesbitt.
organizer: JamesSuckling.com, website of acclaimed international wine critic James Suckling
venue: James Suckling Wine Central, 22 Staunton Street #2nd floor, Hong Kong, 00000, Hong Kong, Hong Kong
description: Join us for an unforgettable evening dedicated to the pinnacle of Champagne, hosted by JamesSuckling.com Staff Writer & Critic, Claire Nesbitt. She covers Champagne annually with James, and this exclusive dinner celebrates a selection of the region's iconic houses, culminating in a tasting of two perfect 100-point wines. From the purity of non-vintage Bruts to the mastery of multi-vintage blends and the prestige of legendary cuvées, this is a rare opportunity to explore the elegance, emotion, and precision that define the world's greatest sparkling wine. Claire will guide you through each flight, sharing insights from her tastings and reports on the Champagne region. Don't miss this chance to taste perfection. 誠邀您參加由 JamesSuckling.com 記者兼酒評家 Claire Nesbitt 主持的香檳盛宴。這場獨家晚宴將聚焦香檳產區的頂級酒莊，呈獻一系列高分佳釀，更以兩款滿分100分的完美香檳作為壓軸，機會難得。 從純淨無暇的無年份香檳、展現調配大師功藝的多年份香檳，到享負盛名的傳奇酒款，這場晚宴將帶您探索世界頂級氣泡酒的優雅、情感與精準。Claire 將引導您品鑑每一組酒款，分享她對香檳產區的深入見解。一場品味完美的極致體驗，正等待您的參與。 Seats are limited to 24 people only. Reserve now to secure your spot. 席位極為有限，敬請盡快預訂。

title: 少雪齋與香港大學圖書館合辦 「夢幻敦煌：重現敦煌大美之境」展覽 百餘壁畫展品1:1重現敦煌洞窟
summary: 少雪齋首次與香港大學圖書館合辦為期三個月的「夢幻敦煌：重現敦煌大美之境」展覽， 於6月7日至9月7日在港大圖書館舉行，公眾人士即日起可免費入場。敦煌研究院、香港大學圖書館及少雪齋共同精心策劃此次展覽，是敦煌研究院首次與香港高等學府及民辦機構合作籌辦展覽。
venue: The University of Hong Kong - Main Library, 1-3/F, Main Library, The University of Hong Kong Pok Fu Lam Road, Pok Fu Lam, HKI, Hong Kong, Pok Fu Lam, HKI
description: 少雪齋首次與香港大學圖書館合辦為期三個月的「夢幻敦煌：重現敦煌大美之境」展覽， 於6月7日至9月7日在港大圖書館舉行，公眾人士即日起可免費入場。敦煌研究院、香港大學圖書館及少雪齋共同精心策劃此次展覽，是敦煌研究院首次與香港高等學府及民辦機構合作籌辦展覽。 展覽包括78件/套具有代表性敦煌藝術品，通過六大主題「第一單元：絲路漫漫」、「第二單元：壁上丹青」、「第三單元：莊嚴佛宮」、「第四單元：萬像人間」、「第五單元：石室寶藏」及「第六單元：悠遊淨土」與沉浸式數字影片，展現敦煌石窟千年匠心的技藝與文化傳承的生命力。 重點推介「莊嚴佛宮」內敦煌莫高窟第45窟，以1:1精準複製首次在香港完整展出，這洞窟佔地面積約25平方米，高近5米。 洞窟內四面牆身及藻井（窟頂）均有唐代壁畫設計，窟頂現傾斜視覺效果，同時包括七具各具特色的彩塑造像，還原現存敦煌莫高窟主尊佛陀結跏趺坐於須彌座上，兩邊隨侍弟子、菩薩、天王等圍繞聽法的盛境。其中菩薩造像獨具特色，以女性軀幹為原型，呈「S」形彎曲、體柔美、嘴角微翹、妙目靈動。與之相映，天王造像形像雄強有力，盡顯威猛剛強。 三樓展區是「悠遊淨土」以數位藝術方式沉浸呈現敦煌佛教藝術風格，除了敦煌飛天和音樂舞蹈壁畫外，亦設有大型屏幕動畫區播放《敦煌壁影》，用動態手法呈現靜態壁畫內容，讓畫中人物在觀眾前舞動起來。 展品還有10個莫高窟獨特藻井圖案，用燈箱掛在天花板，地下設有座墊，可供觀賞人士躺下仰望，感受莫高窟不同藻井圖案的豐富視覺效果。 展覽是「香港大學圖書館少雪齋文化節」的重要環節，其他活動包括五場公開講座、兩場文化表演和八場工作坊，16項精彩活動全部爆滿。 「夢幻敦煌：重現敦煌大美之境」 展覽地址：香港薄扶林路香港大學圖書館1至3樓；免費入場 展期： 2025年6月7日至9月7日 星期一至五：8:30am-9:00pm; 星期六：9:30am-5:00pm; 星期日及公眾假期休館 聯繫電話：(852) 6125 8173 (Ms Chow) 少雪齋 IG：chamberofyoungsnow 文化節於6月7日舉行開幕典禮， 多位政府官員及學者出席致辭，包括港大署理教務長兼副校長（教學）何立仁教授、民政及青年事務局局長麥美娟女士、敦煌研究院陳列中心副主任及研究館員王慧慧女士、少雪齋創辦人孫漢明博士、香港大學首席信息主管及大學圖書館館長伍麗娟女士等。伍女士致詞表示感謝少雪齋的鼎力支持，令展覽規模超過原計劃10倍。歷任敦煌研究院院長及黨委書記，現敦煌研究院研究員、學術委員會主任委員的趙聲良博士參加開幕禮並在其後發表學術演講。 敦煌研究院隸屬甘肅省文物局，是全球敦煌學研究的權威機構、是中国擁有世界文化遺產數量最多、跨區域範圍最廣的文博管理機構、國家一級博物館。在國際文化遺產保護領域具有舉足輕重的地位。 是次文化節以規模空前的展覽內容、豐富的展區設計及創新的數位藝術展覽方式，吸引中西學界和市民入場參觀，廣獲文化界好評。系列高水平的文化活動對敦煌藝術的深度詮釋，和推廣的實踐力道，展現出主辦方在學術與大眾之間搭建橋樑的堅持與用心。 文化節展期三個月，橫跨整個暑假，相信會成為今夏香港文化界其一盛事及旅遊觀光打卡熱點。 關於少雪齋 少雪齋 Chamber of Young Snow 是由李師成博士於2016年推動中西文化交流為目標的非政府組織。李博士於2005年創立居士林，致力於向香港市民介紹佛學的義理及實踐佛法的概念。 李博士熱愛中國藝術文化，並全心投入其發展。他的機構不僅推廣文化，還收藏了從漢代到當代的中國藝術品，並資助北京大學、香港大學及嶺南大學等著名學府，促進文化研究和教育。 李博士在香港新城財經台主持「談文說藝」和「人生百味」兩項節目，粉絲以十萬計。少雪齋透過展覽、工作坊、講座和演出等多樣化活動，吸引年輕人和社區成員參與，特別關注青年人的發展，鼓勵他們探索文化藝術的多樣性。

title: 2025 Hong Kong Law Fair
summary: Join us at the 2025 Hong Kong Law Fair for a day filled with legal insights, networking opportunities, and career guidance!
venue: Hall 5G, Hong Kong Convention and Exhibition Centre, 1  Expo Drive, Wan Chai, HKI, Hong Kong, Wan Chai, HKI
description: Welcome to the 2025 Hong Kong Law Fair! Meet over 50 leading law firms, professional legal organisations and law schools in Hong Kong - all gathered under one roof to offer you insights, guidance, and opportunities to connect with the legal profession. This is your chance to ask questions, explore career paths, and build networks that matter. Free admission is offered to penultimate LLB, double law degree and JD students. Law students from other years are also welcome to register for free admission, but is subject to availability. Non-law and LLM students are welcome to attend with a registration fee of HKD 500, and admission is subject to a quota. Registration is required to attend, and successful registrants will receive a QR code before the event. We look forward to seeing you at Hall 5G, Hong Kong Convention and Exhibition Centre! *In the event of adverse weather conditions (e.g. T8 or above, or a Black Rainstorm Signal), the Law Fair Committee will consider rescheduling the event to Sunday, 7 September 2025, subject to venue availability. Further details will be announced if this occurs.

title: Advanced Contract Law for Non-Lawyers Masterclass Hongkong
summary: REGISTER TODAY! Email: register@crownleadership.com | WhatsApp at: +61 4 8593 1500
venue: Regal Hongkong Hotel, 88 Yee Wo Street, China, NT, Hong Kong, China, NT
description: An advanced version of Contract Law for Non Legal Professionals, this course addresses the most recent and more complex contract law issues faced by executives by Examining advanced elements of contract law and contractual obligations to manage risk, systematically audit contracts and improve dispute resolution methods You will examine the issues in contracts – from conception to completion - manage risks, deal with disputes, damages, and termination in the event of a breach or disagreement. This advanced course will highlight on how judges deal with issues of interpretation of contracts and how and what you must do to ensure that ambiguity is avoided in documentation. title: Anti-Loneliness Club | Dinner with Strangers: Hong Kong
summary: Join us for a fun night out with new friends in Hong Kong. Build your community in the city through our socials and make connections!
venue: Restaurant of the Week, 5 Connaught Road Central #25/F, Hong Kong, HKI, Hong Kong, Hong Kong, HKI
description: When was the last time you did something completely spontaneous? Our series groups together complete strangers for a fun night out. That's right, you sign up, and we book the restaurant. We know life can get busy. Don't forget to spend time making new friends! Why do city life alone when you can build your community with us. Embrace the awkwardness of meeting new people for the first time blindly: all ages, interests, hobbies, and backgrounds. This project is to host dinners in 100 cities to combat loneliness in the modern world while supporting locally owned businesses. Each month, dinner is held at a different restaurant. These dinners are not directly associated with the restaurants, but are simply based on a table reservation. This micro-event is intended to be for 4-6 people maximum. If the evening you signed up for does not hit the minimum number of signups, please be open to joining us on another night with a fuller group. Check out our feature in Eventbrite's 2025 TRNDS report about embracing the micro-event trend. How does it work? After you register, you'll be emailed an introduction message. We'll stay in touch with you leading up to the night of the dinner. Expect a Final Details email the day of. *Your registration does not include your individual food and drink purchases. A paid ticket simply makes you more committed to actually showing up. *Sign up one time, and you'll join our database to be invited to all dinners. *These outings are intended to help people make friends. These are not singles gatherings. *If you sign up the day of the gathering and do not get a welcoming message from us in time, simply email ermantourageimpact@gmail.com, request a refund, or please be open to joining us on another evening. Our vision is simple: we take the no gimmicks approach to networking. No need for yet another app to take up space on your phone - just four walls and a roof and good food for people to connect :) We coordinate with you directly, human-to-human. If you have any more questions, please contact ermantourageimpact@gmail.com! Brought to you by event series Ermantourage. You can also take a look at our main event calendar via Posh for coffee meets, evening hangouts, and more!

title: Freedom Fridays
summary: Join Ali Abdaal for Freedom Fridays: live life on your own terms through financial and time freedom. Interactive talk + Q&A.
venue: the Hive Sheung Wan, 35 Hillier Street #33, Sheung Wan, HKI, Hong Kong, Sheung Wan, HKI
description: Join Ali for an exclusive Freedom Fridays session where we'll tackle the real question: how can you live life on your own terms through achieving time and financial freedom? This isn't about quitting your job tomorrow. It's about building options so you can actually live life on your own terms. What we'll cover depends on what you ask, but might include: You're doing well on paper but something's off. Maybe you're missing family stuff because of work, or you want flexibility but can't afford the pay cut, or you just know there's got to be a better way than grinding until retirement. Come with your questions. Whether it's about starting a side business, transitioning careers, or just figuring out what you actually want - we'll work through it together. Ready to build some options? Bring your questions about time freedom, financial freedom, and living life on your own terms. Let's figure this out. "Half the doctors I asked said they'd quit tomorrow if they won the lottery. The other half said they'd work part-time. That's when I realized I was heading toward the same trap - and decided to build my way out." Space is limited to ensure an intimate, high-value experience.

description: ORGANIC HILL WINE DINNER 🍷🍽️🥩 🎤Guest Speaker Leon Hill Founder of Organic Hill Organic Hill was a creation that was born from all facets of Leon's experience gained in over twenty years in the Wine Industry. The creation of Organic Hill was personal, it was health conscious, it was me. Leon's Organic wine journey began personally back in 2009 when he realised that he was Gluten intolerant (not Coeliac) and needed to find Gluten free products. This led him to discover the myriad of Organic shops located in and around Melbourne, many of which also sold Organic wine. After lots of trial and error searching for a solution to my intolerances, it became obvious that it was also Preservatives that I was allergic to, therefore Organic simply made sense. ===== 📅 31/07/2025 (Thursday) 🕗 19:30 🏠 The Victuals 3/F, Bayfield Building, 99 Hennessy Road, Wan Chai 💰 $980 (4 Courses Menu) 🍽️Sous Vide Watermelon with Tiger Prawns 🍽️Pan Seared Matsusaka Pork Toro 🍽️Dry Aged Beef Cannelloni 🍽️Grilled Greekstone Prime Ribeye 🍷Paired with 6 glasses of Australian Organic Wine and a cult red wine worth $1380 per bottle ===== Little Bit More About Organic Hill Wines~ Organic Hill Winemaker - Matt Wenk ⭐Former chief winemaker for Two Hands Wines (2002 - 2013) ⭐A fact that is largely unknown Matt remains the only winemaker in the world to have wines of his making in internationally acclaimed Wine Spectator top 100 for 10 consecutive years.

title: Reviving Hong Kong's Ocean Heritage – Our Forgotten Oyster Reefs
summary: "Our Forgotten Oyster Reefs" highlights the ecological and cultural importance of oyster reefs and showcases local restoration efforts.
venue: eslite spectrum Tsim Sha Tsui, 3 Salisbury Road 2-3/F, Tsim Sha Tsui, KOW, Hong Kong, Tsim Sha Tsui, KOW
description: Oyster reefs — once thriving along Hong Kong’s coastlines – are now nearly lost. These remarkable ecosystems are vital for healthy oceans, thriving fisheries, coastal resilience, and are deeply rooted in local culture. Today, however, oyster reefs are among the most endangered marine habitats in the world and there is an urgent need to restore them.Through illustrated displays, the exhibition "Reviving Hong Kong's Ocean Heritage – Our Forgotten Oyster Reefs" highlights the ecological and cultural importance of oyster reefs and showcases local restoration efforts. It also showcases how local conservation teams use scientific methods to restore oyster reefs and rebuild a healthy marine ecosystem. The exhibition also features a screening of the documentary “City of Shells”, which delves into the ecological value of oyster reefs and the restoration efforts being undertaken in Hong Kong. ExhibitionDate: July 16 - August 30, 2025Venue: exhibition venue, 3/F, eslite spectrum Tsim Sha Tsui Store

title: Traditional Chinese Walled Village + 300 years old Temple
summary: Most of the tourists visited Hong Kong Island and Kowloon but rarely visit New Territories.
venue: 大圍站, Tai Wai MTR Station, Hong Kong, NT, Hong Kong, Hong Kong, NT
description: Most of the tourists visit Hong Kong Island and Kowloon but rarely visit New Territories. People asked me where are the buildings over 300 years old. The British colonial period started in 1841 (only 182 years ago). What did Hong Kong look like in the pre-colonial period? In this tour, I will take you to the ancestral hall of the traditional Chinese House. I will also show you the tradition of worshipping god in a temple. 1. Traditional Walled Village - Tsang Tai UkOne of Hong Kong’s best-preserved walled villages. You can still see the original granite, bricks and timber used to build the village. Guard towers were built on each of the four corners to protect against pirates, who ran rampant in Hong Kong until the early 20th century. This is still a living village. 2. Sha Tin Che Kung TempleThis is a temple of 300 years old. Was built before the colonial period. You will learn about the traditional culture 3. The Old House at Wong Uk Village Wong Uk Village was founded during the reign of Qianlong (1736-1795) in the Qing dynasty by the Wong clan from Xingning county in Guangdong. In the 19th century, the village became a major trading station for travellers and traders plying the route between Guangdong and Kowloon and prospered until the late 19th century. I will show you how to appreciate the fine mural paintings and traditional decorations on the traditional house. 4.High Rock Centre It was old police barracks of Shatin and also the place for orphans. The main building was a large, two-storey brick and wood building. 5 ,6,7..... and more places in the tours. By the end of the tour, you will have more understanding of the traditional side of Hong Kong Meeting Point: We will meet at Tai Wai Station Exit B. In front of DHL express.Tai Wai Station is on East Rail Line of the MTR. The tips for the tour will be collected at the beginning of the tour, HK$300 per person. More than 3 people will be offered a discount. If you want to have a one-person tour, HK$500. I guarantee it is worth the cost.

description: What the cello says 提琴說 Come join us at Sky Music Studio for an evening filled with the enchanting sounds of the cello, where we explore the intricate and fascinating relationship between music and mental health! title: Work in Europe / Sweden - Jobs, Employers, Work Visa (HK)
summary: Get help with applying for your Swedish work visa, meeting employers and applying for jobs.
venue: Hong Kong WeWork, 1號 Shing Cheong Road, Hong Kong, HKI, Hong Kong, Hong Kong, HKI
description: ABOUT THIS WORKSHOP: Our workshop is specially designed to give international job seekers in Sweden an insight into what is required by Swedish employers and how to improve their chances of success. All workshops are held as 1 on 1 sessions via online web meetings over Skype. Typical duration is 45 mins. WORKSHOP CONTENTS: This is your chance to work directly with a recruiter and get help with moving to Sweden, finding a job and settling down. You will learn how to apply for jobs in Sweden and getting your work permit / visa. Learn about applying for jobs: 1. How to match your skills and experience with Swedish companies hiring 2. Which industries you should focus on and how to find out about jobs available ? How to find opportunities at companies such as Spotify, Truecaller, Tictail that are rapidly expanding into international markets. 3. How to connect with employers hiring international talent and who to contact 4. How to present your skills and competencies. 5. How to apply at the right time depending on the industry and company. 6. How to send your CV and follow up 7. How to get decisions and interview requests. 8. Your expected salary and salary negotiations Learn about getting your work permit: 1. How the work permit application process works 2. How to meet employer and migration board requirements. 3. How to qualify for fast track work permit application 4. How to secure your work permit, tax id number (personal number) 5. What you need to know before you arrive in Sweden - housing, food, expense budgets, bank account, settling in 6. Your rights as an international job seeker, insurance, trade union rules 7. How to secure a permanent work residence permit 8. Common mistakes international job seekers make and how to to avoid application errors

title: 免費 - Algorithmic Trading Development Workshop (Cantonese Speaker)
summary: 今時今日，程式交易已經成為投資界主流方向。
venue: Hong Kong Productivity Council, 78號 達之路, 九龍塘, KOW, Hong Kong, 九龍塘, KOW
description: 利用程式交易，你可以準確分析各方面收集得來的數據，利用大數據 (BIG DATA) 技術進行嚴格的專業分析，並且嚴格執行所有交易決定，再不依靠人員操作，杜絕人性弱點。 研究指在波動市況中，電腦全自動執行交易的能力比人手強，在投資環境越趨波動下，程式交易是唯一至勝的方法。 什麼是程式交易 ? 程式交易是以電腦程式交易為主之交易系統，其決策依據完全以市場價格及人氣指標理論所衍生出來的定價模式基礎，將市場上常用之技術指標，寫入電腦軟體系統中，藉由程式算出買賣點，投資者依其訊號進行買進或賣出，而不以投資者主觀看法 (Trend View) 進行操作。 程式交易的優點在於利用電腦化的訊號，以防止投資人因為大盤走勢所產生的情緒反應，作出不理性的下單，另外，也可透過一致化的交易規則，而免除追漲殺跌的操作，進而追求穩定之報酬率。 究竟如何利用數據增加投資成功率？如何從巨量數據及資料中找出重要訊息作出投資決定？如何利用程式交易作出明智的決策？ 名師介紹: K.S. Lee K.S. Lee 為資深的 IT 技術開發從業員及現任大數據分析專家，畢業於香港理工大學，擁有超過二十多年開發經驗及一直致力於大數據分析，非常熟悉及擅長於開源平台 R 和 Python 進行大數據挖掘 (Data mining) 和分析。 K.S. Lee 積極參與不同的大數據分析，更擔任多間大專院校之講師，擁有超過十年教學經驗，所教門生甚多，教授範圍覆蓋不同範疇包括：Machine Learning，Data Science，Data Mining 及金融科技等，除了教授不同的理論，更將業界之工作經驗與學生分享。

description: AutoCAD 是什麼？Autodesk AutoCAD 為 Autodesk 最熱門的產品，亦是世界上最流行和專業之 CAD 設計軟件，其應用的範圍亦非常廣泛 。針對市場對 AutoCAD 設計需求日益增多，我們特別開辦免費 - Autodesk AutoCAD 工作坊，並由專業的室內及傢俬設計師設計及教授。 課程將採用 Autodesk AutoCAD 軟件。 名師介紹:Mike Ng 全球首100名頂尖「3D視覺設計師」之一 Mike於香港理工大學系統設計及市場學(產品設計)碩士課程後創立 Mike Creative Design Studio，為不少辦公室、豪宅及大型商場店舖等擔任室內設計項目，工作期間不忘自我增值，考取了多項Autodesk、3ds Max Design及Revit Architecture等國際認證，及參加不少國際性室內設計比賽及屢獲殊榮。 獎項包括：由 3dats (Autodesk授權出版社) 評審頒贈「全球首100名頂尖 3D視覺設計師」榮譽、由國際設計師協會主辦Int'l Design Award 2008 「室內設計- 其他」類別冠軍等。 經過嚴謹的審核，Feva Works 於 2017年9月1日起，正式獲 Autodesk 認可成為香港區指定 Autodesk 認可培訓中心。配以專業教材、最新電腦系統、專業 Autodesk 認證講師，務求為廣大市民提供最優質、最專業及最可靠的 Autodesk 培訓課程。

title: 仙禽 -「酸甜平衡的代表」| Myicellar 雲窖
summary: 誠邀大家一嚐翻新後的新形象！
venue: MyiCellar Showroom 907, MyiCellar Showroom 907 20 Westlands Road, Quarry Bay, HKI, Hong Kong, Quarry Bay, HKI
description: 創業於1806年的仙禽酒造以特別注重酸度和新鮮度的表現聞名，近年更進行了品牌翻新，「江户回歸」。江戶回歸是一個聚焦於「農業」、「技法」、「思想」的新品牌。選用栃木櫻市產的「山田錦」，並推動有機米的使用，實現可持續農業。釀造過程遵循傳統生酛技術，並結合現代創新，營造出獨特風味。藉著這個機會讓大家一嚐翻新後的新形象！

title: 100-hours Inversion Teacher Training Certificate Course
summary: Monday, Wednesday & Friday Morning, 9:30 am-12:30 pm, 01st September 2025 ~ 26th September 2025
organizer: Anahata Yoga - Yoga from the heart
venue: Anahata Yoga - Yoga from the Heart, Lyndhurst Terrace #Tower, 18/F, Hong Kong, HKI, Hong Kong, Hong Kong, HKI
description: Anahata Yoga is a premier yoga centre based in the heart of the Central district. It is best known for offering the most authentic yoga experience available in Hong Kong, with classes led by Indian instructors hailing from different lineages devoted to the practice and study of yoga. As a centre, Anahata Yoga is fully committed to fostering a community of yoga practitioners who are not only equipped with the skills to perform yoga as a daily activity but as well as the knowledge to live out yoga as a lifestyle. About Anahata Yoga Accredited “100hrs Inverse Yoga Teacher Training Course” Anahata Yoga’s accredited Inversion Yoga Teacher Training is designed with the developmental needs of our students at the centre – learning to understand the physical and mental challenges of the inversion poses and how to appropriately teach these poses safely is fundamental to a yoga teacher’s skill set. The core of our teacher training program is to provide our students with the knowledge and skill to enable them to then teach inversion poses with awareness for the unique anatomy and physiology needs of their students. Also, to skill them with a wide variety of methods and tools to tailor their teaching appropriately and with confidence. Our faculty of teachers who are teaching this inversion teacher training are from the andiappan yoga tradition. They have embedded yoga into their daily lifestyle and understand the importance of teaching the foundation yogic practices in a manner that enables the students to build a strong foundation for a lifelong yoga journey. All of our teachers have substantial experience as yoga teachers and in teaching inversion and inversion-themed classes, workshops, private classes – they all have extensive experience in transforming students’ practices and capabilities, to levels where the students can practice basic to advanced postures with confidence and in a safe manner without fear for risk of injury.

title: 100-hours Kids Yoga Teacher Training (Saturday Morning and Afternoon)
summary: 100-hours Kids Yoga Teacher Training (Saturday Morning and Afternoon) 01st November 2025 - 06th December 2025
organizer: Anahata Yoga - Yoga from the heart
description: Anahata Yoga is a premier yoga centre based in the heart of the Central district. It is best known for offering the most authentic yoga experience available in Hong Kong, with classes led by Indian instructors hailing from different lineages devoted to the practice and study of yoga. As a centre, Anahata Yoga is fully committed to fostering a community of yoga practitioners who are not only equipped with the skills to perform yoga as a daily activity, but as well as the knowledge to live out yoga as a lifestyle. Starting a yoga practice at a young age creates a healthy life for youngsters. By nature, children’s minds and bodies are flexible, adaptable and easily teachable. So long as yoga is fun, creative and interactive, it’s an activity they’re sure to like. In addition to being a great physical activity, yoga offers an entertaining way for children to learn about the mind and body, and their functions and abilities. Children also learn to balance their emotions and improve their focus and concentration through yoga. Various studies have shown that children who regularly practice yoga have better health and emotional balance, and are less likely to be afflicted with common health issues such as allergies, asthma, digestive disorders, obesity, ADD and ADHD. At Anahata Yoga, parents who enjoy yoga also pave the way for their children to enjoy the activity, making yoga a regular family activity and cultivating a healthy lifestyle. And just as yoga can be tailored according to the needs and capacities of every individual, so can kids’ yoga be designed to match the interests of every individual child – not only ensuring a healthy body and mind, but also some fun and laughter along the way. Anahata Yoga’s Kids’ Yoga Teacher Training Course (100 hours) is one of the first accredited Certification Programme for Kid’s yoga in Hong Kong. Anahata Yoga offers a solid foundational grounding of yoga instruction and mindful yoga practices for children. Students learn the physiology and psychology of children of various age groups, and how to incorporate yoga to their leisure time as a hobby, a sport, and a discipline in a fun and creative way. “It takes a big heart to shape little minds,” it is said. At Anahata Yoga, students learn to teach kids’ yoga from the heart. At the end of our programme, students will be able to confidently teach yoga to children and design creative yoga classes for children of various age groups. For further details, please click the link below: https://anahatayoga.com.hk/training_workshop/100-hours-kids-yoga-teacher-training-saturday-morning-and-afternoon-2/

title: 100-hours Pranayama and Meditation Teacher Training Course
summary: Breaks - 29 October 2025. Class Schedule: Monday & Wednesday (6:30 pm - 9:30 pm)
organizer: Anahata Yoga - Yoga from the heart
venue: Anahata Yoga - Yoga from the Heart, Lyndhurst Terrace #Tower, 18/F, Hong Kong, HKI, Hong Kong, Hong Kong, HKI
description: Anahata Yoga is a premiere yoga centre based in the heart of the Central district. It is best known for offering the most authentic yoga experience available in Hong Kong, with classes led by Indian instructors hailing from different lineages devoted to the practice and study of yoga. As a centre, Anahata Yoga is fully committed to fostering a community of yoga practitioners who are not only equipped with the skills to perform yoga as a daily activity, but as well as the knowledge to live out yoga as a lifestyle. Anahata Yoga's 100 Hours Pranayama & Meditation Teacher Training Certificate Course gives yoga practitioners, enthusiasts, and aspiring instructors the chance to learn the art of mindfulness and mindful living. Through the course, students gain a better understanding of the basics of breathing, concentration and meditation techniques and how it influences the body and mind. We recognize that yoga is a popular pursuit in Hong Kong. People seek it out for its health benefits and often incorporate it into their active lifestyles. However, yoga instruction is not equal among the various yoga centers in Hong Kong. This is where our accredited Teacher Training Courses make all the difference. Our courses are accredited by and offered in conjunction with, Asana Andiappan College of Yoga and Research Centre in India. This is the first time outside of India that such a program is being offered. Our classes are designed and taught in the same way as our instructors are taught. Predominantly from India, our instructors are fully learned not only in the practice of their discipline but also in the history and philosophy behind the practice. The resulting combination of grassroots knowledge both practical and theoretical in our programs give students more in-depth learning that they may able to find elsewhere in Hong Kong.

Our courses are accredited by and offered in conjunction with, Asana Andiappan College of Yoga and Research Centre in India. This is the first time outside of India that such a program is being offered. Our classes are designed and taught in the same way as our instructors are taught. Predominantly from India, our instructors are fully learned not only in the practice of their discipline but also in the history and philosophy behind the practice. The resulting combination of grassroots knowledge both practical and theoretical in our programs give students more in-depth learning that they may able to find elsewhere in Hong Kong.

title: 100-hours Prenatal Yoga Teacher Training Certificate Course
summary: 3rd November 2025 - 10th December 2025, Monday & Wednesday (6:30 pm - 9:30 pm)
organizer: Anahata Yoga - Yoga from the heart
venue: Anahata Yoga - Yoga from the Heart, Lyndhurst Terrace #Tower, 18/F, Hong Kong, HKI, Hong Kong, Hong Kong, HKI
description: Anahata Yoga is a premiere yoga centre based in the heart of the Central district. It is best known for offering the most authentic yoga experience available in Hong Kong, with classes led by Indian instructors hailing from different lineages devoted to the practice and study of yoga. As a centre, Anahata Yoga is fully committed to fostering a community of yoga practitioners who are not only equipped with the skills to perform yoga as a daily activity, but as well as the knowledge to live out yoga as a lifestyle. Anahata Yoga’s Accredited 100 hours Prenatal Yoga Teacher Training Course (RPYT) is a comprehensive prenatal yoga certification program designed to equip aspiring yoga instructors with a strong foundational knowledge of physiology and anatomy in pregnancy. Students of the course will learn to support women in every stage of pregnancy, through delivery, and even into the early days of motherhood. The 100 hours Prenatal Yoga Teacher Training Course is a specialized program for yoga practitioners aspiring to teach yoga to pregnant women. Students are taught how various yogic practices are adapted and modified during various stages of pregnancy and early motherhood. Highly qualified and experienced instructors will teach the physical and mental changes that occur normally in a pregnant body, and how yoga can help promote a smooth pregnancy. At the end of this course, students will be able to deliver specific pre- and post-natal classes for pregnant women. title: 「好心程」 - 免費心理健康朋輩支援小組(廣東話)
summary: 「好心程」是由新常態慈善機構舉行的免費心理健康朋輩支援小組。
organizer: The New Normal Charity Hong Kong
venue: D'hub (太子地鐵站 D 出口，行1分鐘就到), Unit 14BC, HQ,) 450-454 Portland Street, Prince Edward, KOW, Hong Kong, Prince Edward, KOW
description: 簡介： 誠邀你加入我們，一起分享經歷、尋找慰藉，並集結團體的力量創造更共融的社會！ 關於活動： 這個朋輩支援小組是為了支持你面對心理健康的挑戰。 語言在溝通和分享中非常重要，而我們也知道在香港尋找心理支援和相關資源並不容易。因此，我們更堅信用廣東話來提供支援是非常重要。 透過這個小組，我們希望能為你提供所需的支持和幫助！ 主題： 朋輩支援：在一個包容、無批判的環境中，從容地分享個人故事、面對的挑戰，以及如何克服困難，並同時從他人的經歷中獲得啟發。 社區共融：我們希望為你建立一個強大的支持網絡，讓你與志同道合的人連結和同行，擴展你的社交圈子，共同邁向前方的旅程。 自我關懷：你可以學習有效的自我關懷方法，從他人的經驗中取經。 適合人士： 我們的免費支援小組歡迎任何正在尋找支持、理解和社群的廣東話人士。無論你是否面對心理健康的挑戰、經歷悲傷或失落，或者只是想提升自我關懷技巧，我們都歡迎你加入「好心程」的旅程！ 我們期待在「好心程」中與你相見！ 活動內容 朋輩支援小組是參加者聚在一起，分享故事和互相支持的地方。小組將由兩位經過培訓的志願者主持，他們與你一樣，走過類似的心路歷程。 第一次參加小組感到緊張是正常的，我們明白分享自己的故事需要勇氣。但請你相信，你值得得到別人的關心和支持，隨時加入我們，就算只是靜靜地聽也絕對歡迎。 小組開始時，主持人會進行簡單介紹，然後邀請你自我介紹，邀請你分享你為什麼參加。之後，你不需要有壓力去發言，我們的主持人將會引導討論。 在這裡，你可以： 隨心分享故事，談談這些經歷如何影響你的生活 真實地分享你的感受和情緒 討論如何面對情緒健康的高低 小組分享指引 為了確保這個小組對每個人都包容，我們有一些基本的分享原則，希望大家遵守： 保密性：小組的內容是保密的，請不要在外面討論具體細節，也不允許錄音。 真誠分享：這裡是讓你誠實分享經驗的地方，沒有批評或對錯。 自由發言：如果你不想發言，完全可以選擇靜靜地旁聽。 專注傾聽：請給予說話者充分的注意，當有人分享時，其他人應該保持安靜。 引導對話：如果主持人需要引導話題或掌控時間，請不要誤解我們在打斷你。 彼此友善：對自己和他人要有善意。 同理心：請用同情心來傾聽他人。 尊重經驗：我們不會進行比較，每個人的經歷都值得尊重。 請注意 這個朋輩支援小組是讓大家分享個人困難和互相支持的地方。 參加者可以來聆聽，但這不是觀察的空間。你應該來這裡參與朋輩支援，而不是作為學生進行研究、臨床人員觀察，或媒體報導，除非已獲得我們的書面同意。 關於新常態慈善機構 我們是香港S88註冊的慈善機構，於2022年開始在香港舉辦免費朋輩支援小組。 這些小組由志願者主導。我們的主持人雖然經過培訓，但並不是心理健康專業人士。我們並不是為參加者提供建議，而是提供一個分享、連結和支持的空間。 我們相信沒有人會感到孤單，總有他人能夠理解你的故事。 如果你正處於情緒健康的危機中，無法保證自身安全，請尋求即時幫助： 撒瑪利亞人：2341 7227（至晚上10時），2389 2222（全日） 明愛：18288 自殺預防熱線：23820000 如想了解更多資訊，請查看我們的網站：www.thenewnormalcharityhk.org 太子站步行約1分鐘： 從D出口出站後向右轉，沿砵蘭街直行，大樓位於右邊。 HQ 九龍油尖旺太子砵蘭街450-454號 HQ大廈14樓B C室 D’hub

title: 【零碳小勇士專屬活動】舊衣再時尚工作坊
summary: 隨着年月過去，衣服可能不再稱身。這些衣服和你一起成長，一起經歷過生活上的感動時刻。工作坊以「新故事」為靈感，運用剪裁、縫製、拼貼等技巧，賦予紡織舊物全新生命。工作坊製成品更會於九月份的時尚活動展出，與大家分享你的時尚故事。
venue: 建造業零碳天地 CIC - Zero Carbon Park, 常悅道8號 8 Sheung Yuet Road, 九龍灣, KOW, Hong Kong, 九龍灣, KOW
description: 日期：2025年7月19日 （星期六） 地點：建造業零碳天地 ｜九龍灣常悅道8號 時間：下午3時正至5時正（請提前15分鐘到場進行登記） 活動長度 : 2小時 名額：8名（每組名額只限1位小朋友參與及1位家長陪同） 建議對象：8歲或以上（12歲以下需由成人陪同） 報名費用：港幣$20 *工作坊邀請參加者攜帶3件或以上紡織舊物作為再造工作坊原料 ，紡織舊物不限於 ：衣服 ，毛巾，風褸 ，襪 ，褲 ，被單等不同材質紡織舊物，以豐富拼布圖像效果。 *工作坊將提供基本剪裁工具，參加者亦可自備所需工具方便製作。 *此活動參加者必須為「零碳小勇士」獎章計劃會員，未成為會員可透過此連結登記成為會員。 *如參加者逾時多於15分鐘或以上，將會自動取消席位。 *有關網上預約登記之查詢,請致電: 2100 9800 (星期一至日 上午9時至下午6時) *相關資料必須準確並用於網上預約登記。 Sustainable Fashion Date : 19 July 2025 (Saturday) Venue : CIC-Zero Carbon Park, 8 Sheung Yuet Road, Kowloon Bay Time :3pm to 5pm (Please arrive 15mins early for registration) Duration : 2hours Quota: 8 participants (Only one parent is allowed to accompany one child ) Target Audience : Aged 8 or above (Aged under 12 shall be accompanied by adult) Registration Fee: HKD$20 *Participants are welcome to bring three or more old textile items as raw materials for the workshop. Old textile items are not limited to: clothes, towels, jackets, socks, pants, bedsheets, or other textile materials of different textures to enhance the patchwork visual effect. *The workshop will provide basic cutting tools, but participants may also bring their own tools for crafting for their convenience. *Only the members of "ZCP Green Heroes Award Badges Programme" are eligible on registering the above event, for those who are not members yet, please register as a member in advance with this link. * If the participants are overdue for more than 15 minutes, the seat will be cancelled automatically. *Enquiries regarding online registration, please contact 2100 9800 (Mon-Sun 9am-6pm) *Accurate participant ’s details for registration is required. 備註 Remarks 1. 按此閱讀有關此節目與活動條款及細則和相關之收集個人資料聲明。 Please click and read Terms & Conditions for Activities and Events and Personal Information Collection Statement. 2. 建造業零碳天地由零碳天地以建造業零碳天地之名義擁有及營運。 CIC-Zero Carbon Park is owned and operated by Zero Carbon Building, trading as CIC-ZCP. 3. 舊衣再時尚工作坊「活動」由零碳天地主辦「主辦單位」。 Sustainable Fashion in ZCP ("the Event") is organized by Zero Carbon Building ("ZCB"). 4. 工作坊名額有限，報名以先到先得的方式分配，額滿即止。 The Event is under first-come-first-serve basis due to limited quota. 5. 工作坊將不提供圍裙，如有需要請自備圍裙，以免衣物染污。 No apron is provided in the workshop. Please bring your own one if needed to protect your clothes. 6. 參加者須具備良好的身體健康狀況，並聲明自願參加是次活動和願意承擔自身的意外風險及責任。 Participants shall be physically fit. Participants shall declare to participate the Event voluntarily and entirely at his/her own risk and responsibility. 7. 參加者須遵守所有由主辦單位提出之活動規例及當日之臨時安排及決定。 Participants shall accept and follow the Terms & Conditions for Activities and Events, and all other rules and regulations which may be adopted by the Organizer on the day of the Event. 8. 如有任何爭議，零碳天地擁有最終決定權。 Regarding any dispute arising from the Workshop, the decision of ZCB shall be final and binding. 9. 本條款的中英文版本如有歧義，概以英文版本為準。 In case of any inconsistency between the English and Chinese versions of these terms and conditions, the English version shall prevail. 10 . 建造業零碳天地將會於活動期間拍攝或錄影以作紀錄，所拍攝的相片或影片之擁有權歸建造業議會及零碳天地所有。所有參加者須同意建造業零碳天地可能使用所拍攝的相片或影片作公開展示或宣傳用途而不作另行通知。 CIC-Zero Carbon Park will take photos or videos during the events for recording purposes. The ownership of photos or videos belongs to the Construction Industry Council and CIC-Zero Carbon Park. All participants must agree that the photos or videos taken may be used for public display or promotion purposes without further notice. 11. 若天文台於工作坊開始前4小時內發出黑色暴雨警告信號/八號或以上熱帶氣旋警告，工作坊將改期。若惡劣天氣警告在工作坊開始前4小時或更早取消，工作坊將如常舉行。 If the Hong Kong Observatory issues a Black Rainstorm Warning Signal or a Typhoon Warning Signal No. 8 or above within 4 hours before the workshop starts, the workshop will be rescheduled. However, if these adverse weather warnings are canceled 4 hours or more before the workshop begins, the workshop will proceed as scheduled.

title: 保險員脫單船河
summary: 夏日炎炎，最好嘅活動當然就係出海！嚟緊7月20號嘅船河派對，想邀請大家一齊嚟chill！我哋準備咗唔同水上活動，等大家可以邊玩邊食，盡情同陽光玩遊戲！
venue: 西貢, Sai Kung, Hong Kong, NT, Hong Kong, Hong Kong, NT
description: 夏日炎炎，最好嘅活動當然就係出海！嚟緊7月20號，首個專為金融保險界單身貴族而設嘅船河，想大家一齊嚟chill！ 📅 日期：2025 年 7 月 20 日 (日) 🕗 時間：09:30 - 17:00 📍 地點：西貢 你係咪成日覺得... 💭返工壓力大到爆，有苦自己知？客又煩，同事又難頂，老闆更加唔明你？ 💭想搵人傾訴吓，但係又唔知同邊個講？ 💭單身貴族都會悶喇，想搵個啱傾嘅人一齊享受生活？ 💭參加其他單身派對，人哋一聽到你做保險就耍手擰頭？ *專為保險精英打造嘅理解同共鳴* ，嚟星際脫單船河，你就可以.. ✔️同其他保險公司嘅同行交流吓，搵到真正明白你嘅人 ✔️喺輕鬆愉快嘅環境下放鬆吓，享受吓難得嘅假期 ✔️識多啲新朋友，擴闊吓圈子，話唔定仲搵到另一半添！ ✔️玩盡豐富嘅海上活動，留低美好嘅回憶 ✨ 水上活動包括：香蕉船，吹氣滑梯，海上泳池，Wakesurf (仲有教練指導!!🏄🏻‍♀️)，唱k，麻雀...應有盡有！ 💌 名額：30位 💰費用：HK$1580 希望今次船河係一個好機會俾大家逃離繁忙嘅生活，享受夏日美好時光，同埋識吓新朋友！期待你哋嘅參加，一齊出去玩啦！ 💌 名額有限，立即行動！

title: 「北部都會區建築新機遇：承建商的發展策略與前瞻」研討會

title: 【頌缽入門班】
summary: 你將會學習： ✔️ 敲缽，磨缽，托缽技巧 ✔️ 不同類別敲棒及磨棒的應用 ✔️ 多種療癒手法，包括頭部，平衡左右腦，脈輪手法配合呼吸，腳底療法 ✔️ 自制能量水
venue: 香港執業催眠師中心, 4-5號 諾士佛臺 13樓03室, HK, KOW, Hong Kong, HK, KOW
description: 🔅 聽說頌缽療癒簡單易學，就算是初學者仍能很快掌握竅門？？🔅 想成為自己的療癒師，不再假手於人，讓你重拾內在力量？？ 只要一顆缽，加一顆心，就能輕鬆地在短時間內，進入深度的放鬆，重啟自我療癒力！無需繁複手法或工具，頌缽療癒簡單易學，甚至不失為身心靈課程中，一門較為具體及易掌握的選擇。 頌缽療癒源遠流長，今廣泛被用作新時代音樂治療，能量治療，物理治療等等工具，帶來種種不同的療癒效果，甚至奇蹟。 。 你將會學習：✔️ 敲缽，磨缽，托缽技巧✔️ 不同類別敲棒及磨棒的應用✔️ 多種療癒手法，包括頭部，平衡左右腦，脈輪手法配合呼吸，腳底療法✔️ 自制能量水， 適合對象:🌹想認識頌缽療癒；🌹關注身心靈健康；🌹想改善失眠/情緒/壓力等；🌹想改善身體痛症；🌹想學習以頌缽提升能量狀態；✨實體課提供大小不同類型頌缽，於課程中讓學員更多體驗，學習當中不同之處。 【頌缽入門班】實體課日期&時間：2025年7月30日(三) 7:30-9:30pm導師：Timothy Kwok地址：尖沙咀諾士佛臺4-5號東港商業大廈13樓03室費用：$199**實體課人數有限，必須預先報名及付款留位 🏷️【課程連報優惠】🧧現凡報2個或以上頌缽課程，均有優惠，詳情：https://www.facebook.com/share/r/19CMsSrvSg/ ～～～～～～～～～～～💫 導師簡介 | Timothy Kwok 專注一對一頌缽深度療癒，融合 印度脈輪智慧與中醫經絡理論，以低頻共振配合呼吸靜觀，幫助身心回歸平衡。 曾親歷抑鬱幽谷，深刻體會頌缽療癒的力量，現以所學與實證經驗，陪伴他人走出身心困頓，重拾內在安穩。 ✨ 療癒特色▸ 結合脈輪與經絡的融合療程▸ 強調呼吸引導與缽頻共振的協同效應▸ 著重神經系統調節與自我覺察 🌿 資歷背景・尼泊爾頌缽傳承體系（研習脈輪應用）・中醫十二經絡與聲音療癒整合技術・親身實踐者，從療癒受益者成為療癒師 【查詢及報名】 WhatsApp: 63821806 (或Signal) 可按 https://wa.me/85263821806 FB: facebook.com/singingbowlhongkong IG: instagram.com/singingbowlhongkong

venue: 香港執業催眠師中心, 4-5號 諾士佛臺 13樓03室, HK, KOW, Hong Kong, HK, KOW
description: 【頌缽許願｜潛意識編程工作坊】—— 你的願望一直無法實現，不是因為不夠努力，而是潛意識在「自動導航」舊程式 🔮 你是否有這些「潛意識卡點」？❌ 明明很想要，內心卻有個聲音說「我不配」❌ 設定了目標，卻總在最後關頭「自我破壞」❌ 理性知道該行動，但身體就是「動不起來」❌ 看過很多勵志書，但潛意識根本沒買單 💡 這些，都是你的「潛意識原始碼」在作祟！大腦就像一台超級電腦，大部分行為由潛意識程式控制。如果底層程式寫著「我不值得成功」，再多的表面努力都會被抵消。 🌌 這不是普通的「許願課」，而是一場「潛意識系統升級」，✨ 你將經歷的「潛意識重組過程」1️⃣ 【內在資源】深入潛意識提取珍貴內在資源； 2️⃣ 【深度卸載】運用頌缽聲頻釋放負面能量及信念； 3️⃣ 【新程式安裝】感官未來記憶植入▸ 不是「想像」成功，而是讓神經系統「體驗」已實現的狀態； 4️⃣ 【防護機制】建立「信念防火牆」▸ 停止內耗，鍛煉抗逆能力 「當你改變潛意識，世界會自動重組來匹配你的新版本。」 💫 為什麼這方法有效？1. 繞過表層抵抗：頌缽聲頻快速進入潛意識2. 多重感官錨定：聲音+體感+催眠狀態3. 能量場共振：團體共同創造的場域加速效果 【頌缽許願｜潛意識編程工作坊】📅 日期：7月31日(四)⏰ 時間：7:30-9:30pm📍 地點：尖沙咀諾士佛臺4-5號東港商業大廈13樓03室收費：$299 🏷️【課程連報優惠】🧧現凡報2個或以上頌缽課程，均有優惠，詳情：https://www.facebook.com/share/r/19CMsSrvSg/ 【查詢及報名】 WhatsApp: 63821806 (或Signal) 可按 https://wa.me/85263821806 FB: facebook.com/singingbowlhongkong IG: instagram.com/singingbowlhongkong ～～～～～～～～～～～～～～～ 【 導師介紹：蘇德琪 Nickie So 】 近年多次旅居尼泊爾，跟隨老師修練頌缽療癒，於奧修中心經歷21天的神秘玫瑰靜心，並學習不同的動態靜心。 曾遠赴北京跟隨許明堂教授學習意象醫學，及到少林寺禪修一個月。 也曾到南美經歷一整月的薩滿草藥療癒之旅。 雖然多年前Nickie已是一名催眠治療師，可是她對身心靈整全療癒的追求，仍推動她旅居不同地方，向不同大師拜師學藝，繼續學習療癒自己療癒他人。 資歷： Singing Bowl HK 創辦人能量頌缽療癒師課程系列導師、美國NGH催眠治療師及發證導師、奧修禪咭導師、靈性系統排列師、Registered Life Coach、Certified Developmental Coach、Master NLP Practitioner、象醫調理師、中國心理咨詢師(三級)、物理學碩士等 曾帶領工作坊包括： - 頌缽系列： 能量頌缽療癒師課程系列，經絡X頌缽課程，New/Full moon healing circle，Singing Bowl HK Healing Night，頌缽 X Orgonite 能量療癒，現代薩滿 X 聲音療癒夜，照顧者同樂日，七輪唱誦等； - 催眠系列： 療癒內在小孩，愛與原諒，自我催眠提升運動效能，未來演練，前世回溯，飲食信念等 - 奧修系列： Osho Active Meditation Series，奧修禪咭課程 - 藝術相關： 黑彩聲頻療癒夜，花藝X頌缽療癒，五味人生，禪食體驗等

title: 18-hour Aerial Yoga Teacher Training with Joanne Wu
summary: For Yoga instructors to expand their teaching repertoire and Aerial Yoga Practitioners to deepen their knowledge.
venue: The Yoga Room, 104 Jervois Street 4th Floor, Hong Kong, HKI, Hong Kong, Hong Kong, HKI
description: Date: 17-19 October 2025 (Fri-Sun)Time: Friday 18:30-2130, Saturday & Sunday 0900-1730Fee: HK$4,800 (Early Bird 1 month buffer), HK$5,200 (Regular)Venue: The Yoga Room * Maximum of 10 participants * English manual, bilingual teaching * Suitable for practitioners with 3+ months of Aerial yoga practice * Yoga Alliance Accredited certificate will be distributed upon completion to count towards continuing education hours. About this Teacher Training Course:Aerial Yoga is a suspension exercise that integrates traditional Yoga asana with concepts of aerial arts. This 18 hours Aerial Yoga teacher training serves as an entry point of your aspiring Aerial Yoga teaching journey as we will discuss topics including but not limited to the foundation and history of Aerial Yoga, set up, functional anatomy, teaching methodology, safety management and sequencing techniques. This course is designed for Yoga instructors to expand their teaching repertoire and Aerial Yoga Practitioners to deepen their knowledge. AgendaDay 1 - Friday 1830-2130 (3 hours) * 1 hour Aerial Yoga Decompression Class * Course introduction * Aerial Yoga background (history, development, philosophy) * Teaching methodology Day 2 - Saturday 0900-1830 (8.5 hour per day with 1 hour lunch 12:30 - 13:30) * 1 hour Aerial Yoga Class (Mobility) * Apparatus set-up * Guiding Principles of Aerial Yoga: flexibility, strength, decompression * Class Management: cueing, class planning, spotting and management, safety precautions * Anatomy and biomechanics * Art of Sequencing * Practicum Day 3 - Sunday 0900-1830 * 1 hour of Therapeutic Aerial Yoga Class * Advanced sequence * Anatomy and biomechanics * Sequence breakdown, analysis * Practicum * Teaching assessment (20 mins each) Please drop us an email at info@yogaroomhk.com / call 2544-8398 / WhatsApp 6685-9097 for details. Booking can also be made directly through our office, please contact us.

title: 200-hours Yoga Teacher Training Certificate Course
summary: Sunday Morning & Afternoon(10:00am - 1:00pm & 2:00pm - 5:00pm)10th August 2025 - 2nd November 2025
organizer: Anahata Yoga - Yoga from the heart
venue: Anahata Yoga - Yoga from the Heart, Lyndhurst Terrace #Tower, 18/F, Hong Kong, HKI, Hong Kong, Hong Kong, HKI
description: Anahata Yoga is a premiere yoga centre based in the heart of the Central district. It is best known for offering the most authentic yoga experience available in Hong Kong, with classes led by Indian instructors hailing from different lineages devoted to the practice and study of yoga. As a centre, Anahata Yoga is fully committed to fostering a community of yoga practitioners who are not only equipped with the skills to perform yoga as a daily activity, but as well as the knowledge to live out yoga as a lifestyle. Anahata Yoga’s 200 Hours Teacher Training Certificate course gives yoga practitioners, enthusiasts, and aspiring instructors the chance to deepen their self-knowledge of yoga philosophy and improve on various aspects of their practice. It is an open-level training programme, suitable for those who have never done yoga before as well as those who have put in years of practice. Through the course, students gain a better understanding of yoga’s origins, history, as well as its philosophy. Students also learn how they may improve on their postures, that they may execute them with accuracy and, later, be able to demonstrate it to others. We recognize that yoga is a popular pursuit in Hong Kong. People seek it out for its health benefits and often incorporate it into their active lifestyles. However, yoga instruction is not equal among the various yoga centres in Hong Kong. This is where our accredited Teacher Training Courses make all the difference. Our courses are accredited by and offered in conjunction with, Asana Andiappan College of Yoga and Research Centre in India. This is the first time outside of India that such a programme is being offered. Our classes are designed and taught in the same way as our instructors are taught. Predominantly from India, our instructors are fully learned not only in the practice of their discipline but also in the history and philosophy behind the practice. The resulting combination of grassroots knowledge both practical and theoretical in our programmes give students more in-depth learning that they may able to find elsewhere in Hong Kong.

description: 2025「與農共耘」義工計劃透過共耕共作的農務體驗，讓都市人走進鄉村農田，由觸摸土地開始，重新解放身體五感，感受有機種植對自然的重要、學習本地傳統農藝的智慧、細味鄉村文化的醇厚，讓農村與城市重新連繫，建立互助互信的社區關係。 計劃將會以「SEED河背農圃」作為共作基地，並每月第一個星期日舉辦義工活動日。參加者將會由經驗豐富的農夫帶領，學習與自然共存的生產方式，體驗一年四季的農田變化，品嚐春夏秋冬的在地味道。 歡迎任何人士參與，走進農田，回歸樸實，與農夫同行走過每一個歷程，收獲非一般的體驗！ 請留意：十二歲或以下人士必須由家長或監護人陪同參與。由於部分農務工作需具備種植經驗或足夠的體力，主辦單位將會按照個別人士的經驗、能力及身體情況分配合適的工作，並會安排休息時間。 活動詳情： 日期：1月至12月，每月第一個星期日** 時間：上午9:00 至下午1:00 語言：粵語 （按需要可提供簡單英語翻譯） 費用：每位港幣50元，包括共作「時令農產茶點」 內容： 備註： 義工需自備個人用品： **因天氣情況或個別事件，活動日有機會取消或改期，敬請密切留意本會的最新通知。

title: 《飛越品牌大獎2025》頒獎典禮暨展覽交流會
summary: 10月4日 - 《飛越品牌大獎2025》頒獎典禮暨展覽交流會約定你！ 本次大獎融合「科創成果 +知識產權 + 大灣區」 你將可以用超值的入場價格（早鳥優惠票價低至200元！）與大灣區機構、獲獎企業及行業領袖建立聯繫，精準挖掘大灣區及香港的政策資源，探索合作空間。
organizer: 經緯青年商會 JCI Queensway
venue: 7/F, Nina Hotel Tsuen Wan West, 8 Yeung Uk Road, Tsuen Wan, NT, Hong Kong, Tsuen Wan, NT
description: 《飛越品牌大獎》作為經緯青年商會自2021年創立的旗艦活動，已成為香港及大灣區廣受認可的品牌評選平台。過去四年，已有90+企業獲得殊榮。大獎活動吸引3000+人次參與，通過100+合作主流媒體提供500+媒體報導，觸達百萬瀏覽量。 2025年，《飛越品牌大獎》迎來第五屆，以全新主題「創科未來，守護知識產權，共贏大灣區」隆重展開。本屆大獎聚焦推動創新科技應用、強化知識產權管理，並促進香港與大灣區的雙向經濟合作，致力於打造更緊密的區域商業聯繫。 《飛越品牌大獎》為參與者提供展示實力、拓展商機與促進合作的平台，促進創科及知識產業領域的優秀企業與青年深入交流，創造更多就業、創業與投資機會，激發無限創新潛力。 今年，我們希望邀請「不只想被看見，而是想帶動改變」的品牌，一同加入。 提名表格：https://www.jciqueensway.org.hk/eba/tc/rgfaq.php 截止提名日期：2025年9月1日 ------------------------------------------------------------------- 10月4日 - 《飛越品牌大獎2025》頒獎典禮暨展覽約定你！ 本次大獎融合「科創成果 +知識產權 + 大灣區」 你將可以用超值的入場價格（超早鳥優惠票價低至200元！）：

title: 【文化沙龍】《夢遊英倫音樂朝聖團2025：David Bowie/Beatles/Radiohead & More…》
summary: 志淙將分享多年來他對英倫音樂及樂隊的情懷、多次飛越參與音樂節及訪問的難忘故事，以及九月朝聖之旅的心思。除了參觀 V&A 的最新 David Bowie 展覽，還有 Radiohead 在牛津的特展，志淙將分享豐富的第一手故事和資料。
venue: 旅遊研究所 - 中華漆廠大廈 6 樓全層, 旺角廣東道1163號 中華漆廠大廈 6 樓, Hong Kong, KOW, Hong Kong, Hong Kong, KOW
description: 【文化沙龍】黃志淙 《夢遊英倫音樂朝聖團2025：David Bowie/Beatles/Radiohead & More…》 日期：2025-07-26 （六) 時間：1700-1830 地點：旺角廣東道1163號中華漆廠大廈 6 樓 內容簡介： 童年青年中熱愛的音樂人物，在生命中都一定擁有極重要的位置，坂本龍一的音樂持續啟迪許多人，2025年1月和3月的東京心路遊讓我們體驗了許多奇蹟興感動。接下來，我們將踏上九月的英倫朝聖之旅，探索The Beatles、David Bowie、Radiohead 等樂隊的影響力。志淙將分享多年來英倫音樂與樂隊的情懷，和多次飛越參與音樂節及訪問的難忘故事，以及九月朝聖之旅的心思。除了會參觀 V&A 的最新 David Bowie 展覽，還有 Radiohead 在牛津的特展，志淙將分享豐富的第一手故事和資料。 黃志淙博士 aka Chi Chung’s Choice 資深電台DJ/聲音藝術家/音樂/文化/教育/策展人。現任香港知專設計學院 Curator-in-residence 駐校創作家，主力負責 V Music Library 黑膠唱片體驗館，亦曾在母校HKU主理GE十多年。自1980s一直致力透過電台電視等媒體，推廣多元音樂、文化藝術。”Chi Chung’s Choice” 更與無數世界級巨匠及本地大師新血等對話、交流，甚至合作。志淙曾策劃多個跨地域/文化項目，包括大衛寶兒的華語歌《剎那天地》（2000）、坂本龍一 《async》 大碟 (2017)、坂本龍一學堂（2024）、ImagineLand 天空草地 （2024…）。近年更親身導航坂本龍一東京心路遊。 【夢遊英倫音樂朝聖團】詳細資料： 🌟行程亮點 嘉賓導賞 朝聖 David Bowie 最新 V&A 大型藏展 Abbey Road 週邊城市漫步 訪尋音樂名人歷史足跡 傲遊牛津 參觀 Radiohead 展覽及分享生活逸聞 ABBA Voyage 享受頂尖藝術科技音樂視覺體驗 穿梭 Brick Lane & Notting Hill 發掘在地音樂文化 走進 Design Museum 重尋 80s 新浪漫發源地 Blitz Club 【夢遊英倫音樂朝聖團】 📅日期：2025 年 09 月 28 日（日）至 10 月 3 日（五）（倫敦集合） 📝團號：EXTUKLHR202509A 🔥🔥🔥本團現正接受報名 🔥🔥🔥 🌿機會難逢 名額有限 額滿即止！ 🌿如欲報名，請 WhatsApp 6618 3022 與旅行社職員接洽 🌿或致電 2713 0998 查詢 🌿或電郵至 info@extravelism.com 旅遊研究所｜Extravelism 旅行社牌照號碼：354367 https://www.instagram.com/extravelism/

title: 300-hours Advanced Hatha Yoga Teacher Training Course Level 1 – Level 3
summary: Breaks - 1 , 25 May 2026, 19 June 2026 & 1 Jul 2026
organizer: Anahata Yoga - Yoga from the heart
venue: Anahata Yoga - Yoga from the Heart, Lyndhurst Terrace #Tower, 18/F, Hong Kong, HKI, Hong Kong, Hong Kong, HKI
description: Anahata Yoga is a premiere yoga centre based in the heart of the Central district. It is best known for offering the most authentic yoga experience available in Hong Kong, with classes led by Indian instructors hailing from different lineages devoted to the practice and study of yoga. As a centre, Anahata Yoga is fully committed to fostering a community of yoga practitioners who are not only equipped with the skills to perform yoga as a daily activity, but as well as the knowledge to live out yoga as a lifestyle. The Level 1,2 Advanced Hatha Yoga Teacher Training Certificate Course is for yoga practitioners interested in growing their knowledge of Hatha yoga and developing their techniques in executing various Hatha yoga poses. The course is divided into 3 levels, each of which focuses on basic and intermediate poses, their possible modifications and variations, and teaching and demonstration techniques. The aim of the course is to challenge practitioners to advance in their practice by exploring the limits of their body and overcoming them, as well as to develop their knowledge of the body in order to better understand every joint and muscle nuance in the poses. By the end of the course, participants shall be able to demonstrate the wide range of Hatha yoga poses, explain their possible modifications and variations, and demonstrate the steps required to achieve the pose. Levels 1 and 2 of the course are of the same level of intensity but focus on different practical and teaching aspects of advanced practices hatha yoga. Level 1 covers Introduction of Hatha yoga, its origins, the basic anatomical details of the poses and its various approaches from the beginner's point of view. Proper Warm-up and preparatory practices are covered in detail. Level 2, on the other hand, covers other variations of the poses with deeper learning and practice. The student will get to practice many variations and modifications of the poses and learn how to modify as per their limitations. Level 3, students learn the teaching techniques of postures taught in the first two levels, as well as Partner Yoga variations, usage of straps, Chair Yoga, and the art of demonstration. Students also learn to sequence poses, teach the advanced Hatha yoga classes, and develop a class theme that focuses on various levels. As the final level in this series of training, Level 3 prepares students as Advanced Hatha Yoga Teachers. You can first take levels 1 & 2 and then the teacher will decide whether you are ready for level 3, after the completion of level 2 this time or wait for next time. Usually, we will have two advanced YTT in a year. This course is best suited for We recognize that yoga is a popular pursuit in Hong Kong. People seek it out for its health benefits and often incorporate it into their active lifestyles. However, yoga instruction is not equal among the various yoga centers in Hong Kong. This is where our accredited Teacher Training Courses make all the difference. Our courses are accredited by and offered in conjunction with, Asana Andiappan College of Yoga and Research Centre in India. This is the first time outside of India that such a program is being offered. Our classes are designed and taught in the same way as our instructors are taught. Predominantly from India, our instructors are fully learned not only in the practice of their discipline but also in the history and philosophy behind the practice. The resulting combination of grassroots knowledge both practical and theoretical in our programs give students more in-depth learning that they may able to find elsewhere in Hong Kong.

title: 300-hours Yoga Therapy and Ayurveda Teacher Training Certificate Course
summary: Breaks:Oct 20 - 26 and 29 Oct, Xmas - 22 Dec 2025 - 1Jan 2026. Class Schedule: 06th Oct 2025 - 16th Jan2026( Mon, Wed & Fri Morning)
organizer: Anahata Yoga - Yoga from the heart
venue: Anahata Yoga - Yoga from the Heart, Lyndhurst Terrace #Tower, 18/F, Hong Kong, HKI, Hong Kong, Hong Kong, HKI
description: Anahata Yoga is a premier yoga center based in the heart of the Central district. It is best known for offering the most authentic yoga experience available in Hong Kong, with classes led by Indian instructors hailing from different lineages devoted to the practice and study of yoga. As a center, Anahata Yoga is fully committed to fostering a community of yoga practitioners who are not only equipped with the skills to perform yoga as a daily activity, but as well as the knowledge to live out yoga as a lifestyle. We recognize that yoga is a popular pursuit in Hong Kong. People seek it out for its health benefits and often incorporate it into their active lifestyles. However, yoga instruction is not equal among the various yoga centers in Hong Kong. This is where our accredited Teacher Training Courses make all the difference. Our courses are accredited by, and offered in conjunction with, Asana Andiappan College of Yoga and Research Centre in India. This is the first time outside of India that such a programme is being offered. Our classes are designed and taught in the same way as our instructors are taught. Predominantly from India, our instructors are fully learned not only in the practice of their discipline, but also in the history and philosophy behind the practice. The resulting combination of grassroots knowledge both practical and theoretical in our programmes give students more in-depth learning than they may able to find elsewhere in Hong Kong. Yoga therapy and Ayurveda may be worlds apart, but through this specially-designed course, participants will be given a good introduction to the two sciences as well as a solid foundation on which to build their knowledge. The course is a good starting point for those interested in learning more about these two subjects. Explore the principles of yoga therapy and Ayurveda and their various applications in our daily lives. Understand the body, its functions and how to address common ailments through various yogic practice and Ayurvedic diet principles.

title: 50 HR YIN YOGA TEACHER TRAINING 2025
summary: Yoga Room is excited to welcome David Kim back to Hong Kong in Aug 2025 to lead this 50-hr Yin Yoga Teacher Training at the studio.
venue: The Yoga Room, 104 Jervois Street 4th Floor, Hong Kong, HKI, Hong Kong, Hong Kong, HKI
description: 📌 Price: ⁠Level 1+2: HK$9,500 (Early-bird) HK$10,800 (Regular)Level 1: HK$ 6,300Level 2: HK$4,600📌 Dates:Level 1: 23-26 Aug, 2025 (Sat-Tue)Time: 8:30am-5pm Level 2: 29-31 Aug 2025 (Fri-Sun)Time: 8:30am – 4:30pm (Friday & Saturday)Time: 8:30am – 3:30pm (Sunday) 📌 Venue: The Yoga Room Level 1: (30 hours) Materials Covered: The YogaWise Yin Yoga Teacher Training (Level 1) is designed for students and teachers who wish to develop a deeper knowledge of this multifaceted yoga style, and emerge with a working definition and basic teaching methodology for Yin Yoga. There will be a strong emphasis on Anatomy, highlighting skeletal variations, the role of connective tissue, and the nervous system. An introduction to mindfulness meditation will address the non-physical nature of this profoundly quieting practice. Key Features of the YogaWise Yin Yoga Training (Level 1) include: Specific Highlights: Level 2: (20 hours) Materials covered: The YogaWise Yin Yoga Teacher Training (Level 2) is designed for current Yin teachers or those already familiar with the basic orientation and language of Yin Yoga. This 20-Hour Level 2 course offers a closer examination of upper-body anatomy , and integrates the concept of myofascial meridians with practical sequencing strategies for both Yin and Yang classes. The course will also explore creative solutions and variations of Yin postures for students with limitations. Key Features of the YogaWise Yin Yoga Training (Level 2) include: Specific Highlights: Introduction to Myofascial Meridians Functional Anatomy for Yin Postural Variations: Mindfulness in Practice: About David Kim: DAVID KIM (E-RYT500) is a U.S.-based international Senior Yoga Teacher Trainer, who teaches both Yin and Vinyasa (YogaWorks) styles, and has led numerous 200- and 300-Hour Teacher Trainings, workshops, and retreats across the globe. David’s passionate embrace of Yin Yoga owes a deep debt of gratitude to his mentors Paul & Suzee Grilley; to Sarah Powers’s meditative grace; to the cumulative wisdom of cutting-edge anatomy and movement teachers; and to the dedicated students who have accompanied him along this path towards personal and spiritual awareness. David is a registered Continuing Education provider with Yoga Alliance (USA), and taking this course will allow you to receive 20, 30 or 50 Hours of Continuing Education credit with YA. Enquiry and Sign Up: Please drop us an email at info@yogaroomhk.com / call 2544-8398 / WhatsApp +852 6685 9097 (Click to start chat) for details.

title: Adobe InDesign x Photoshop x Illustrator CC 應用工作坊 (Cantonese Speaker)
summary: Adobe InDesign | Photoshop | Illustrator
venue: Hong Kong Productivity Council, 78號 達之路, 九龍塘, KOW, Hong Kong, 九龍塘, KOW
description: 打造大師級作品 一次過掌握設計職場必備技能 Adobe InDesign | Photoshop | Illustrator 工作坊綜合三大 Adobe CC 平面設計軟體，結合 Photoshop X Illustrator X InDesign 的實用設計技巧。 如相片合成及特效﹑公司 Logo 及宣傳品設計﹑網頁設計﹑插畫繪製﹑排版設計及電子書的全面商業設計均可利用以上軟件完成。Creative cloud 更加入雲端賣點，可配合手機，平板電腦，下載對應 Adobe CC 的應用程式，隨時隨地流動創作，盡享雲端便利，只要能靈活運用此三大軟件，再加創意，必定能創作出驚喜的設計，打造大師級設計作品。 Adobe Creative Cloud 是業界標準的圖像設計軟件，廣受專業設計師的喜愛。 Photoshop CC 是針對點陣圖 (相片) 的設計軟件，主要負責影像編修與設計 Illustrator CC 是針對向量圖 (幾何圖) 的設計軟件，主要負責插畫繪製與設計 Indesign CC 則是針對排版的設計軟件，主要負責排版設計與電子書製作

description: 主題：【用AI 創造社會影響力 ：人工智能應用 科技發展影響力】 企業面臨著科技快速變化的挑戰，如何有效人工智能的潛力成為成功的關鍵。本次商社交流夜，我們將提供獨特AI的洞見，除了嘉賓分享之外，更有互動環節，為企業應對人工智能及市場變化提供見解。 Topic: AI for Impact: AI Applications & the Impact of Technological Advancement In an era of rapid technological change, businesses face mounting challenges — and unlocking the potential of artificial intelligence has become a key to success. Join us at this Cross-Sector-Polination Series, where we will offer unique insights into AI applications. In addition to guest speaker sharing, there will be interactive sessions designed to equip businesses with perspectives to navigate AI disruption and market transformation. 分享嘉賓： Cyron Chan 陳思朗先生 General Manager (ITRC) The Hong Kong Council of Social Service (HKCSS)香港社會服務聯會 (社聯) 作為一名內部創業者，快速原型化創新理念並建立新商業模式，以促進社會服務領域的技術賦能。透過提升業界技術能力，推動更高效且現代化的服務交付、規劃與倡導工作。他將分享在無程式碼開發、設計思維、AI社會創新及新創孵化等領域的實戰經驗。 As an intrapreneur, rapidly prototype innovative ideas and develop new business models to facilitate technology enablement within the social service sector. Enhance the sector's technological capabilities, leading to more efficient and modernized service delivery, planning, and advocacy. He will share his experience in No & Vide Coding, Design Thinking, AI for Social Innovation & Startup Incubation. Devansh GuptaAI Consultant, Startup Advisor & Founder, Generative AI Enthusiast 作為一位熱衷於生成式AI、初創策略與產品孵化的創業者與顧問，Devansh曾與多間機構合作推動AI導入與商業應用。他將分享其在不同地區推動AI教育與產品落地的經驗，特別是如何用AI解決真實世界的問題。 As a passionate entrepreneur and consultant in generative AI, startup strategy, and product incubation, Devansh has collaborated with various organizations to drive AI adoption and commercial applications. He will share his experiences in advancing AI education and product implementation across different regions, with a focus on how AI can be used to solve real-world problems. 門票 Ticketing 夢創價：夢創伙伴/善經濟會員 - 免費 公開體驗價：非伙伴/會員 - 港幣$100/位 即場報名價：港幣$120/位 Impact Price: Impact Partner/Association for Well-being Economy (AWE) member: Free Public Price: HK$100 per person Walk-in/Public price: HK$120 per person

title: Algorithmic Trading Development Workshop (Cantonese Speaker)
summary: 今時今日，程式交易已經成為投資界主流方向。
venue: Hong Kong Productivity Council, 78號 達之路, 九龍塘, KOW, Hong Kong, 九龍塘, KOW
description: 利用程式交易，你可以準確分析各方面收集得來的數據，利用大數據 (BIG DATA) 技術進行嚴格的專業分析，並且嚴格執行所有交易決定，再不依靠人員操作，杜絕人性弱點。 研究指在波動市況中，電腦全自動執行交易的能力比人手強，在投資環境越趨波動下，程式交易是唯一至勝的方法。 什麼是程式交易 ? 程式交易是以電腦程式交易為主之交易系統，其決策依據完全以市場價格及人氣指標理論所衍生出來的定價模式基礎，將市場上常用之技術指標，寫入電腦軟體系統中，藉由程式算出買賣點，投資者依其訊號進行買進或賣出，而不以投資者主觀看法 (Trend View) 進行操作。 程式交易的優點在於利用電腦化的訊號，以防止投資人因為大盤走勢所產生的情緒反應，作出不理性的下單，另外，也可透過一致化的交易規則，而免除追漲殺跌的操作，進而追求穩定之報酬率。 究竟如何利用數據增加投資成功率？如何從巨量數據及資料中找出重要訊息作出投資決定？如何利用程式交易作出明智的決策？ 名師介紹: K.S. Lee K.S. Lee 為資深的 IT 技術開發從業員及現任大數據分析專家，畢業於香港理工大學，擁有超過二十多年開發經驗及一直致力於大數據分析，非常熟悉及擅長於開源平台 R 和 Python 進行大數據挖掘 (Data mining) 和分析。 K.S. Lee 積極參與不同的大數據分析，更擔任多間大專院校之講師，擁有超過十年教學經驗，所教門生甚多，教授範圍覆蓋不同範疇包括：Machine Learning，Data Science，Data Mining 及金融科技等，除了教授不同的理論，更將業界之工作經驗與學生分享。

title: Allure Gypsy Swing with Orient Gadjo
summary: Immerse in vibrant, rhythmic melodies with Orient Gadjo—a unique musical journey through the heart of Gypsy Jazz.
venue: allure customised hair, 3 School Street Tai Hang, Hong Kong, HKI, Hong Kong, Hong Kong, HKI
description: www.alluremusicsalon.com Step into the rhythm of our century-old stone house at Allure Music Salon and let Orient Gadjo sweep you away. Feel the artistry as Pierre Veniot, Ron Ng, Stéphane, and Jimmy Pittman blend gypsy jazz with eclectic grooves. It’s a vibe, a journey through sound and history that resonates deep in the soul. 走進我們百年歷史的石造屋「Allure Music Salon」，感受 Orient Gadjo 帶來的迷人韻律。隨著 Pierre Veniot、Ron Ng、Stéphane 和 Jimmy Pittman 將吉普賽爵士與多元節奏完美融合，沉浸於這份音樂與歷史交織的氛圍，深深觸動靈魂深處。 ✨ Tai Hang’s Allure Pass 2025 Discover the charm of Tai Hang, where hair, music, and cuisine blend seamlessly into a unique urban escape. 💇‍♀️🎶🍴 From chic styling to live melodies and culinary delights, this chill community invites you to explore, indulge, and unwind. 🌟 Your Allure Pass opens doors to exclusive perks—just show it and enjoy. ✨ 大坑 Allure Pass 2025 探索大坑的獨特魅力，感受髮型設計、音樂與美食的完美交融。💇‍♀️🎶🍴 從時尚造型到動人旋律，再到美味佳餚，邀您放鬆身心，盡情享受。🌟 憑Allure Pass尊享專屬禮遇! Explore the Artistry of Musicans Meet the musicians of Orient Gadjo, who will be delivering an unforgettable night of music at the Allure Music Salon: Pierre Veniot: Pierre is a seasoned saxophonist and flutist who specializes in jazz. He has participated in the Montreal Jazz Festival multiple times and founded the world music group Anoosh. His extensive career has made a significant impact on young musicians in Hong Kong. Ron Ng: A graduate of the Hong Kong Academy for Performing Arts, Ron is a skilled guitarist with a wide range of experience in genres such as jazz, blues, and rock. He is not only an excellent performer but also a dedicated music educator. Stéphane: Originally from Belgium, Stéphane is a Manouche guitarist whose style is heavily influenced by Django Reinhardt. His passion for Gypsy Jazz is evident in every performance. Jimmy Pittman: From Chicago and now based in Hong Kong, Jimmy is a bass guitarist adept in various musical styles. He is very active in Hong Kong's music scene, effortlessly playing jazz, funk, and classical music. Allure Music Salon: Evenings of Music and Mastery Allure Music Salon, nestled in Tai Hang's historic Century Stone House, Hong Kong, hosts enthralling musical evenings and workshops. Our Incubating series and Masters events spotlight emerging talents and seasoned maestros, fostering connections and inspiring audiences. Join us for a transformative experience where creativity shapes the future of music. title: Amandine Lourdel à Hong Kong le 17 septembre 2025
summary: Amandine s'est beaucoup cherchée. Beaucoup, beaucoup. Elle le raconte dans son spectacle "Renversée".
venue: BaseHall, 1 Connaught Place #LG/F, Central, HKI, Hong Kong, Central, HKI
description: Le spectacle Amandine s'est beaucoup cherchée. Beaucoup, beaucoup. Elle a tellement cherché qu'à un moment elle a même envisagé une formation de chien truffier. Ce spectacle c'est comme un petit personnage de bd qui passerait de bulle en bulle sans jamais trouver de siège libre pour son fessier, sans trouver sa place. À force de rester debout elle a fait du stand up. Et vous a trouvés, vous.Un moment de scène où elle se livre, à fleur de pot de départ. Spectacle pour trentenaires déglinguées. «Elle allie érudition et vente à la criée.» Un mec une fois. La presse en parle “Sa voix rocailleuse, son regard, sa force d’écriture : absolument tout impressionne.” — Nouvel Obs “Avec sa gouaille impayable, cette nouvelle venue prometteuse narre sa condition de femme célibataire malgré elle avec une verve qui fait mouche.” — Le Monde “Sa verve de prolo, son observation du quotidien et sa plume cynique font mouche.” — Télérama L'humoriste Née le 27 mars 1988 à Troyes, Amandine Lourdel est une humoriste française dont le parcours atypique mêle théâtre, cinéma et stand-up.Issue d’une formation théâtrale solide, elle obtient en 2006 une mention très bien au Conservatoire de théâtre de Troyes, suivie d’un diplôme de l’ESRA en 2010. Elle poursuit sa formation au Cours Simon en 2011, puis au Conservatoire du 20ᵉ arrondissement de Paris, dont elle sort diplômée en 2015. En 2019, Amandine crée sa propre compagnie et lance les soirées “Cabaret”. C’est en 2021, après la pandémie, qu’elle se lance pleinement dans le stand-up. En deux saisons, elle se fait remarquer sur de nombreux plateaux et festivals d’humour, remportant plusieurs prix. En 2024, elle est programmée au BO Saint Martin, participe au festival d’Avignon et rejoint la Bande Originale sur France Inter. Elle intègre également la liste des artistes produits par TS3 Prod, un gage de la qualité et de l'originalité de ses performances. Son spectacle “Renversée” est salué pour son humour frontal, oscillant entre sarcasme, ironie et satire sociale. Elle y dissèque mœurs et appartenances avec une gouaille sans pareil. Sa plume acérée et sa présence scénique magnétique font d’elle une voix incontournable du stand-up français Info billetterie Date : mercredi 17 septembre 2025 à 20h Tarifs : • 290 HKD en prévente jusqu’au 30 juin 2025 à 23h45, ou dans la limite des places disponibles • 340 HKD en billet standard Adresse : Basehall 02, 1 Connaught Place, #LG/F, Central, Hong Kong Island Spectacle en placement libre. Moyens de paiement 1 . PayPal 2 . Carte de crédit ou débit: lors de la commande, lorsque la page "Pay with Paypal" s'affiche, cliquez sur "Create an account". Vous allez être redirigé sur la page "Pay with debit or credit card".

title: Backstage Comedy Presents Elena Gabrielle Live! in Hong Kong
summary: Elena's satirical look on modern relationships teamed with her uproarious musicality has seen her steal the show all over the world
venue: BaseHall 2, 1 Connaught Place #15 LG/F, Hong Kong, HKI, Hong Kong, Hong Kong, HKI
description: funny tales and unfiltered stories, Elena’s here to solve all your problems—or at least make you laugh about them! This time, she's going beyond her usual wild adventures to dive right into the audience. Yes, that means crowd work, so be ready to get involved! Elena’s blend of quick wit, hilarious storytelling, and no-holds-barred interactions will leave you wondering, “Did she just say that?” and maybe, “Am I next?” Come with questions, leave with laughs—and possibly a little scandal. About Elena Gabrielle: Elena Gabrielle’s satirical look on modern relationships teamed with her uproarious musicality has seen her stealthe show from Canada to South Africa. This Australian born European based comedian appeals to sold out audiences across the globe with her witty, no?holds barred approach to stand-up comedy and because of this, has seen her go viral with 40 million plus views on YouTube to date. Her embarrassing date stories are delivered in an intuitive storytelling style which cuts through cultural divides and is enjoyed globally. After touring non-stop for 3 years with ‘Story Party Tour’ (which saw her perform over 700 shows in that time and in over 65 countries) and sold-out runs with her 2 solo tours “DIRRTY” in 2021/22 and “Addickted” in 2023, Elena is back on tour in 2024 with her new show “OK!?.In 2021 Elena was the face of two global “Swatch” advertising campaigns and her talents are greatly sought after across Europe, even opening for the US comedian and Netflix star Iliza Schlesinger. Multi-talented, she is trained in Musical Theatre at Australia’s prestigious and premier acting University NIDA (National Institute of Dramatic Art). Elena’s singing range is also impressive; from opera to rap, she weaves her passion for song into her comedy act with musical imitations from Celine Dion to Lady Gaga. She performed in The Shuffle Show’, an epic musical adventure of 1000 songs in 1 hour which sold out shows at the Edinburgh Festival Fringe and went on to appear on TEDx. Elena also holds a Guinness world record for producing and performing in Burleskathon, 24 hours of continuous Burlesque. Elena’s tongue-in-cheek and relatable comedy repertoire blended with her sublime singing voice and risque performances have worldwide audiences side-creased, exhilarated, and thoroughly entertained. This show is in English

title: Basic Plant Specimen Workshop
summary: Discover the fascinating world of herbaria and botanical science in our hands-on Basic Specimen Workshop!
venue: Dream Impact 夢創成真, 4/F, 760 Cheung Sha Wan Road #Unit C, Lai Chi Kok, KOW, Hong Kong, Lai Chi Kok, KOW
description: Herbaria are at the core of botanical research, serving as permanent archives of invaluable plant information crucial for biodiversity, ecology, biogeography, evolution, conservation, and restoration efforts. Within each herbarium lies thousands to millions of preserved plant specimens, each carrying its own scientific significance, history, and natural beauty. But have you ever wondered what exactly a herbarium is, how it’s organized, or how these specimens are made? In collaboration with Encompass HK and Pi Lab Limited, this hands-on workshop offers an introduction to the fundamentals of botany and plant specimen preparation. Guided by experts, you’ll have the unique opportunity to create your very own herbarium specimen—perfect to display at home or gift to loved ones—while discovering how science and artistry come together in this timeless practice. Join us for an inspiring afternoon that blends science, nature, and creativity—perfect for plant enthusiasts and curious minds alike! Remarks: Individuals with allergies to camphor or G6PD deficiency are advised not to participate in the workshop due to safety concerns.

title: Candle-Making Workshop (Kids & Adults)
summary: Learn the basics of candle making and let your creativity run wild with our selection of scents, unique marbling technique and crystals.
venue: Hiraya Scent & Co. PMQ, 35號 Aberdeen Street S412, 4th Floor, Block A, Hong Kong, HKI, Hong Kong, Hong Kong, HKI
description: Learn the basics of candle making and let your creativity run wild with our selection of scents, unique marbling technique and selection of crystal chips. As a cherry on top - this workshop comes with complimentary, celebratory drinks once the candle has been poured and is solidifying. Wine not? More on the experience: We start with an exploration of scents where you are can select your pick of 2 or 3 fragrances to blend together in order to create your own signature scents. This is followed by the basics of candle making where we calculate oil to wax ratios in which we also discuss the properties of our sustainable and non-toxic Coconut Apricot Wax and Luxury Fragrance Oils. We then get to the exciting part where you get to choose your design, be it a solid color candle in 7 color options or a multi-color marbled design. This part is completely DIY so you can let your creativity lead you. Our experienced host(s) will assist you when you need it of course! Once the candles are poured, complimentary mulled wine or mulled wine tea will be served. You can then sit back and relax and watch our candle experts design your candle tops as you like it or for the brave souls - give it a go yourself! Optional DIY labels will be offered too. But if you're too mesmerised by your gorgeous marbling design, feel free to opt out!

title: Canvas of Sound : A Harpist’s Palette
summary: Immerse yourself in enchanting Harp melodies paired perfectly with original artwork by the harpist. Limited seats — reserve yours today !
venue: MG Tower, 133號 Hoi Bun Road 10 樓 E 室, Kwun tong, KOW, Hong Kong, Kwun tong, KOW
description: Welcome to Canvas of Sound : A Harpist’s Palette! Join us for a magical morning filled with enchanting melodies and beautiful harmonies. Our talented harpist will paint a musical masterpiece that will transport you to a world of tranquility and serenity. Date: Sat Jul 26 2025 Time: 4:00 p.m. Location: MG Tower no.133, Hoi Bun Road floor 10E, Sky Music Studio Description: 🎶✨ Harp & Art: A Synesthetic Evening of Sound and Color 🎨🌈Debut Solo Concert – This July in Hong Kong 🪉❤️ Join me for a deeply personal and immersive evening where music and art come together in a unique expression of synesthesia — the connection between sound and color. I’ll be performing my first solo harp concert, and each piece is paired with original paintings I’ve created, inspired by the emotions and colors evoked through the music. This is more than a concert — it’s a sensory journey through sound, art, and emotion. 🌟 All ticket proceeds after deducting all the relevant costs will be donated to:🕊 PARACLETE – Care and Comfort Angels Project, a charity offering therapy and emotional support for those experiencing bereavement. PARACLETE holds special meaning for me and my mum — after my father passed away, they were there for her, offering steady support during a difficult time. This concert is my way of giving back to those who helped us heal. 🎨 Original artworks will also be available for purchase after the show. A portion of those proceeds will go to PARACLETE as well. 🎟 Seating is limited – for a more intimate and meaningful experience. Let the harp's delicate melodies and vibrant visuals transport you to a place of peace, color, and connection.Reserve your seat today and support causes that make a real difference.

title: Complicated Grief
summary: A peer support group to openly discuss shared experiences of complicated grief by The New Normal. All are welcome.
organizer: The New Normal Charity Hong Kong
venue: The Hive Wan Chai, 23 Luard Road 9/F, Wan Chai, HKI, Hong Kong, Wan Chai, HKI
description: What it is:Complicated Grief is a supportive space for those who feel their grief comes with added complexities, no matter the circumstance. Our peer-led groups provide a supportive and understanding environment for anyone navigating grief influenced by factors such as, but not limited to, suicide loss, estrangement, being cut off or distant from the person who died, traumatic loss, multiple losses, relationship breakdown or stigma. What happens:A peer support group is where people come together to share personal stories, listen and support one another with kindness. You will be welcomed by two hosts who are trained TNN volunteers with lived experience on the topic of the group. It is normal to feel nervous, and sharing can be a big decision. Remember you are deserving of care and support. You are welcome to join us and just listen. Our hosts will welcome you and provide an introduction, then we will ask you to introduce yourself and your reason for joining us. From then on there is no pressure to speak. Our hosts will facilitate the conversation. A peer support group is a supportive space where people can: Share stories and how our experiences are currently impacting our lives Talk about our feelings and emotions Share and discuss coping strategies Group guidelines: We have some basic guidelines that we ask everyone to adhere to, to ensure this remains an inclusive space for everyone: Please note: As a peer support group, this group is for peers to share their personal struggles and support one another. Attendees are welcome to come and listen but it is not a space to observe. You should attend to engage in peer support. It is not a space for students to contribute to their studies, for clinicians to observe, or for the press unless written agreement from the charity has been obtained. Who are The New Normal Charity? We are a Hong Kong S88 registered charity. The New Normal Hong Kong has been hosting our free peer support groups in Hong Kong since 2022. Our groups are facilitated by volunteers. While our hosts are trained to facilitate, we are not mental health professionals in this space. We do not give advice, we provide space for all of you to share, connect and support. Nobody should ever feel alone, and there is always somebody who can relate to your story. www.thenewnormalcharityhk.org If you are in crisis and don’t feel like you can keep yourself safe, there are immediate services available. 危機求助熱線如果你覺得你不能保證自己的安全 Samaritans 2341 7227 (until 10pm) 2389 2222 (24/7) Caritas 18288 SPS Hotline 23820000 Address The Hive Wan Chai 9/F, The Phoenix, 23 Luard Rd, Wan Chai, Hong Kong How to get there 3 minute walk from Wan Chai Station: From Exit C, turn left and walk along Lockhart Road. Turn right when you reach Luard Road. Walk up Luard Road – The Phoenix will be on your left.
